thread.title: Rule 2.10 Announcement

title: Rule 2.10 Announcement
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 13, 2015, 18:25 BST - UK Markets closed Rule 2.10 Announcement 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
RSA Insurance Group plc 
NOT FOR RELEASE, PUBLICATION OR DISTRIBUTION IN WHOLE OR IN PART IN, INTO OR FROM ANY JURISDICTION WHERE TO DO SO WOULD CONSTITUTE A VIOLATION OF THE RELEVANT LAWS OR REGULATIONS OF THAT JURISDICTION 
13 August 2015 
Disclosure of total RSA Insurance Group plc (“RSA”) shares in issue pursuant to Rule 2.10 
In accordance with Rule 2.10 of the City Code on Takeovers and Mergers (the "Code") RSA confirms that as at the date of this announcement, it has in issue 1,016,886,068 Ordinary Shares of £1.00 each. The International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) of the Ordinary Shares is GB00BKKMKR23. RSA has a sponsored Level 1 American Depositary receipts (“ADR”) programme. Each ADR represents one RSA Insurance Group plc ordinary share. The ADRs trade in the over the counter market, OTC. The trading symbol for these securities is RSNAY and the ISIN is US74971A2069. 
ENDS View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150813006133/en/ Contact
